duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage Project Permanent files and perform data entry.
Run reports and perform due diligence as required.
Research relevant information to assist project Supervisor.
Compose correspondence including letters and emails as directed by Supervisor.
Maintain strict confidentiality of company information and records.
Display sense of urgency and understanding of project deadlines.
Proofread documents and reports for accuracy and completeness.
Work with office staff to ensure a healthy work environment.
Prepare preliminary landowner lists for projects from online sources.
Manage Petty Cash and transcribe minutes of all internal meetings.
Initiate landowner contacts and follow-up as directed by Supervisor.
Adapt to changes in work environment and manage competing demands.
Adhere to company values, demonstrate attention to detail, and exhibit oral and written communication skills.
Continuously improve by attending professional conferences and introducing newly gained knowledge and skills on the job.
Fulfill the needs of internal and external customers and demonstrate the ability to persuade and convince others to support ideas.
Ability to self-start and work independently, with a tolerance for stress and the ability to maintain work product quality and timeliness.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma required, College Degree is a plus.
